Title: Relates to shoreline resiliency infrastructure regulations and tax credits
Summary: Enacts shoreline resiliency infrastructure regulations providing for preventive measures that could be taken to mitigate the impact of future flooding and provides tax credits for twenty-five percent of the costs of such projects.
LawCode: Add §3-0323, En Con L; amd §§210-B & 606, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law and the tax law, in relation to shoreline resiliency infrastructure regulations and tax credits
